name: Karthus
title: the Deathsinger
lore: The harbinger of oblivion, Karthus is an undying spirit whose haunting songs are a prelude to the horror of his nightmarish appearance. The living fear the eternity of undeath, but Karthus sees only beauty and purity in its embrace, a perfect union of life and death. When Karthus emerges from the Shadow Isles, it is to bring the joy of death to mortals, an apostle of the unliving.
blurb: The harbinger of oblivion, Karthus is an undying spirit whose haunting songs are a prelude to the horror of his nightmarish appearance. The living fear the eternity of undeath, but Karthus sees only beauty and purity in its embrace, a perfect union of...
allytips: Ask your allies to help point out when you should use Requiem to get kills in different lanes.
Lay Waste is very strong at farming minions and harassing enemy champions.
enemytips: Karthus can cast spells for a short duration after he is killed. Move away from his corpse to be safe.
Make sure you always have enough health to survive Requiem, even if you have to go back to the base more frequently to heal.

riot_spell_q.name: Lay Waste
riot_spell_q.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy.

If the blast hits only a single unit it deals double damage.

riot_spell_w.name: Wall of Pain
riot_spell_w.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Creates a wall that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed reduced by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).

riot_spell_e.name: Defile
riot_spell_e.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.

riot_spell_r.name: Requiem
riot_spell_r.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
riot_spell_r.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).

riot_spell_i.name: Death Defied
riot_spell_i.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Death Defied
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon taking [[death|fatal damage]], '''Karthus''' remains active for 7 seconds, rendering himself unable to move, [[basic attack|attack]], or use item actives/passives, but becoming {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|Invulnerability|invulnerable}} for the duration as well as being able to use [[Champion ability|abilities]] at no cost.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: If {{ai|Defile|Karthus}} has been learned, it will remain toggled on for ''Death Defied's'' entire duration at no mana cost.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* ''Death Defied'' will always trigger after revival effects ({{ii|Guardian Angel}}, {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}}) and if '''Karthus''' is killed by the [[Nexus Obelisk]].
* '''Karthus''' will still benefit from cooldown reduction during ''Death Defied''.
* After ''Death Defied'' ends, the corpse of '''Karthus''' will retain body block despite being dead on the ground.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Lay Waste
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, '''Karthus''' detonates the target area in the cursor's direction, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies within, '''doubled''' when hitting only one target.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|45 to 125}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Enhanced Magic Damage|{{ap|45*2 to 125*2}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Lay Waste'' briefly grants {{tip|sight}} before detonation.
* ''Lay Waste's'' single-target damage is listed as a {{tip|critical strike}} both in-game (damage text) and in post-game screen ('Largest Critical Strike') but it cannot actually {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} nor will it scale with {{iis|Infinity Edge}} modifier.
* ''Lay Waste'' has a different sound effect when it only hits one target.
* If ''Lay Waste'' only hits one target it will apply {{tip|single target}} [[spell effects]].

wikia_skill_w1.name: Wall of Pain
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karthus''' creates a wall at the target location for 5 seconds and grants {{tip|sight}} around it.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: For the duration, all units who cross it are both {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 4 seconds, reduced by 50% over the first second, decaying over its duration and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|lose 15% magic resistance}}}} for the same duration.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* The {{tip|sight}} is granted around ''Wall of Pain's'' pillars but not the wall itself.
* ''Wall of Pain'' can only affect any given unit once per cast.
* ''Wall of Pain'' is not considered ''terrain'' for {{ai|Searing Charge|Ornn}}.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Defile
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Toggle Off:}} '''Karthus''' restores {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} whenever he kills a unit.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Toggle On:}} '''Karthus''' deals {{as|magic damage}} per second to all nearby units.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Defile'' also restores {{tip|mana}} if ''Karthus'' destroys an enemy structure.
* ''Defile'' will automatically toggle on during {{ai|Death Defied|Karthus}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Requiem
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karthus''' {{ct|channel|channels|attack=false|cast=false|items=false,true|move=false|spells=true,interrupts,false,false,false}} for 3 seconds and deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy {{tip|champions}} upon its completion.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Requiem's'' channel is telegraphed to all enemy champions by a beam of light that descends on all targets.
** There is no visible beam if the enemy champion respawns during ''Requiem's'' channel, yet damage is applied normally.
* ''Requiem'' hits through {{tip|untargetable|untargetability}}.
* '''Karthus''' cannot cast ''Requiem'' if {{ais|Death Defied|Karthus}} duration is less than 3 seconds.
